thread.title: Scott Disick 'fled Costa Rica after Kim Kardashian row' | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Scott Disick 'fled Costa Rica after Kim Kardashian row' | Daily Mail Online

author: Dan Cain For Mailonline
title: Scott Disick 'fled Costa Rica after Kim Kardashian row' | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now He was photographed admiring his on-off partner as the Kardashian clan hung out on a sunny terrace at their private Villa Manzu. But just a day later the handsome star was in Miami and enjoying some one-on-one time with brunette beauty Jessica Harris, a Next model from Philadelphia. The duo embraced and nuzzled each other as they hung out in the pool at the luxurious Setai Hotel. Ladies' man: Scott was seen days later on the beach in Miami surrounded by a bevy of beautiful women and didn't appear to be missing Costa Rica at all Living up to his lothario reputation, Scott was back at it again the following day as he cuddled up to up to a mystery blonde poolside at the same hotel. He was also seen on the beach surrounded by a bevy of beautiful women and didn't appear to be missing Costa Rica at all. Last week Kourtney apparently wasn't sure she wanted Scott coming on the trip after hearing about his partying at the Sundance Film Festival. Sicking together: The Kardashian sisters soaked up the sun at the luxurious villa 'Scott is still in the dog house from partying at Sundance,' a source told People.com on Thursday. 'Kourtney disinvited him.' During a TAO pop-up in Park City, Utah at the film festival, Scott was apparently seen sipping on cocktails and flirting with a pretty brunette. Scott and Kourtney - who were together nine years - share three children together, Mason, seven, Penelope, four and Reign, two. Life of luxury: Scott looked relaxed as he chatted to a brunette at The Setai Hotel
